mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (user_id, location, deal_type, content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{location}, #{dealType}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT review_id as reviewId, user_id as userId, location, deal_type as dealType, content, created_at as createdAt, comment_count as commentCount FROM review ORDER BY created_at DESC
